div.p: Welcome to the South Western School District’s home on the web! All of us – from our faculty and administrators to our staff members – are dedicated to partnering with parents and helping our students develop into capable, confident lifelong learners. Whether you are a student or a parent/guardian, we encourage you to check back often to stay “in-the-know” with the SWSD!

div.h3: The South Western School District is dedicated to providing a continually improving educational environment, through a cooperative effort with the family and the entire community, in which all students are encouraged and expected to achieve their full potential, to express themselves clearly, to think reflectively, and to interact responsibly in preparation for lifelong personal growth.

div.div: Adopted by the Board of School Directors October 24, 1990: Revised March 25, 2002

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1507751758098 vc_row-has-fill vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-o-content-top vc_row-flex

div.h2: Empowering and equipping all students to create their future and change the world.

div.div: Adopted by the Board of School Directors on November 14, 2018

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-o-content-top vc_row-flex
